channel.title: No one knows how to fix this! HELP
channel.description:
when i wield a custom, it goes into the weapon slot, even if it isnt a weapon.
my custom models are stored in the cache. and ive updated the item.java AND item4.java and put the item ID's into the correct ints.
any suggestions?

item.title: No one knows how to fix this! HELP

i uploaded them as txts files.
can someone make the necessary changes and send me a link to them?

item - http://uppit.com/v/FJKXOAF9
item4 - http://uppit.com/v/4MULFN4Q

item.title: No one knows how to fix this! HELP
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

[quote=“Trent!!, post:17, topic:306959”][quote author=GrimReapersScythe link=topic=403129.msg2986754#msg2986754 date=1255035518]
Trent, please supply a download for your item,java, or atleast some snippets of it, because some clients only load certain formats of the item.java. Like some clients, will only load, if the item.java are in number sequence (Ex: 1, 2, 3, …).

[/quote]

the item numbers werent in sequence in the first place.[/quote]

Could be why they aren’t working. If you want me to look at it, upload it and send me link.

Read full topic

item.title: No one knows how to fix this! HELP
item.dc:creator: @Trent1 Trent!!
item.description:
@Trent1 wrote:

GrimReapersScythe:

Trent, please supply a download for your item,java, or atleast some snippets of it, because some clients only load certain formats of the item.java. Like some clients, will only load, if the item.java are in number sequence (Ex: 1, 2, 3, …).

the item numbers werent in sequence in the first place.

[quote=“bloodmaniet, post:16, topic:306959”][quote author=Trent!! link=topic=403129.msg2985847#msg2985847 date=1254963427]
when i wield a custom, it goes into the weapon slot, even if it isnt a weapon.

my custom models are stored in the cache.
and ive updated the item.java AND item4.java and put the item ID’s into the correct ints.

any suggestions?
[/quote]

did you not read what i posted in the first place? what you’ve told me to do is what i have already done. your solution serves no purpose. pretty useless post if you ask me. i’ve check all the item.java files, all 4 of them. read before you post please.

go to server files and check the item.java
also some servers may have different types. so if ur server has other item.java’s open up item.java and item4.java and put the item id in the ints. self explanatory[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: No one knows how to fix this! HELP
item.dc:creator: @Trent1 Trent!!
item.description:
@Trent1 wrote:

[quote=“Steve734, post:11, topic:306959”]go into item.java

  1. If its a shield or something hit ctrl + f then search for “shield” or what ever slot you want it under.
  2. Add the item id under the bracket of the different slots there are.[/quote]

If you read my question carefully, i stated that i have already done this.
I’ve also done it in item4.java

BUT

since i did that my client logs into my server, then stays at the “loading… please wait” but thats easy fixed[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 07, 2009, 08:47:00 pm[/size][hr]bump

item.description:
@Steve734 wrote:

go into item.java

  1. If its a shield or something hit ctrl + f then search for “shield” or what ever slot you want it under.
  2. Add the item id under the bracket of the different slots there are.

item.title: No one knows how to fix this! HELP
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

[quote=“Trent!!, post:4, topic:306959”]im pretty sure that the wielding positions are correct. seeing as its galkons 317 client.

would you like to see how it is set out in the class8.java?[/quote]
Class8 has nothing to do with wielding position, all class8 does, is refers to the model, for the images to add to the game, and rotates the image to it’s desired angle. It has nothing to do with the item slot it goes into.

Read full topic

item.source: No one knows how to fix this! HELP

item.title: No one knows how to fix this! HELP
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

fatwallet:

Thats how it works unless you upgrade to a 317 (rarely) or 508 (around never). I’m guessing you’re using a Czar/Delta base. What you could try is going into the Class8.java and changing the wielding position. Try that.

Lmao? Class8 doesn’t have a wielding position. All it does it recognize the models from the client and adds an image ingame, and rotates the image. All the position slots are in item.java.

[quote=“Trent!!, post:1, topic:306959”]when i wield a custom, it goes into the weapon slot, even if it isnt a weapon.

my custom models are stored in the cache.
and ive updated the item.java, and put the item ID’s into the correct ints.

any suggestions?[/quote]

You need to check the cached models, and make sure you added the correct item id inside the int slot in item.java.

Read full topic
